column5: Looking for an ice transducer for an older Lowrance X100C.  Currently using the normal transducer mounted on my homemade setup.  Works okay, but, I figure the proper ice transducer will be alot less fuss. Anybody have one kicking around they want to part with for a reasonable cost?  I can get a new one from Jocelyn, but, if anyone has any other suggestions I'd be happy to hear them. Feel free to PM.  Cheers, Frank
Like you said in your op, go see Jocelyn.
Yeah, I've already talked to him about it, Ron.  Just looking for a slightly cheaper alternative.  Never hurts to ask, someone might have one kicking around that they aren't using.
Grab one if he has it now Frank... they get as rare as hen's teeth when you really need one !
Your probably right, Wayne.  As soon as that ice starts forming, or January 1st comes, things are gone quickly.  I've said it before, I'm lucky to live as close to his store as I do.
yes you are! one of the best stocked shops in the province
